divs: Sighting DetailsMy boyfriend was letting the dog out and I asked him to take a picture of the moon, he did so and when he brought the camera to me to see the image he got we both immediately noticed the shape of a Dropa Stone above the moon, at once we both looked at each other and asked what is that?
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Novi
There were no other sightings in Novi on or around February 6th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Took a digital picture of the moon, when I reviewed the picture above the moon I can see a round shape that looks alot like a Dropa Stone and it is HUGE!
